channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @gwensnyderPHL Maybe this is just publicity for a yet-to-be-announced mermaid/Middle Earth crossover?
item.source:markdown: @gwensnyderPHL Maybe this is just publicity for a yet-to-be-announced mermaid/Middle Earth crossover?

item.description: @EladNehorai Is the Catholic Church really free if it can’t burn people in the town square for the crime of reading Jewish books?
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai Is the Catholic Church really free if it can’t burn people in the town square for the crime of reading Jewish books?

item.description:
@EladNehorai ״על תקרא חרות אלא חרות״

@EladNehorai Or in Orwell’s colloquial translation, “Freedom is Slavery.”
item.source:markdown:
@EladNehorai ״על תקרא חרות אלא חרות״
@EladNehorai Or in Orwell’s colloquial translation, “Freedom is Slavery.”

item.description: @joshtpm Shouldn’t half the mermaid roles be set aside for fish?
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Shouldn’t half the mermaid roles be set aside for fish?

item.description: @EricJGreenberg1 Does Art still draw? He may be sufficiently reclusive and idiosyncratic that it might be worth it to offer him a ridiculously small @BenYehudaPress advance for him to take it on. But I don’t think he’s invested enough in chasidism one way or the other to go for it.
item.source:markdown: @EricJGreenberg1 Does Art still draw? He may be sufficiently reclusive and idiosyncratic that it might be worth it to offer him a ridiculously small @BenYehudaPress advance for him to take it on. But I don’t think he’s invested enough in chasidism one way or the other to go for it.

item.description: @EricJGreenberg1 For reals! https://t.co/wXl4zWKUEM
item.source:markdown: @EricJGreenberg1 For reals! https://t.co/wXl4zWKUEM

item.description:
@johnastoehr Either he’s changing the subject for DJT, or he’s trying to play in the Senate big leagues (and grab some mindshare from Mitch) and is simply incompetent.

@johnastoehr Or a combination: TFG is waging war against China Mitch, so Graham sees an opportunity.
item.source:markdown:
@johnastoehr Either he’s changing the subject for DJT, or he’s trying to play in the Senate big leagues (and grab some mindshare from Mitch) and is simply incompetent.
@johnastoehr Or a combination: TFG is waging war against China Mitch, so Graham sees an opportunity.

item.description: @HeerJeet I think a reasonable goal for generative AI is being able to ask for “An opera of The Demolished Man as written by Thomas Pynchon” and get back a satisfactory result.
item.source:markdown: @HeerJeet I think a reasonable goal for generative AI is being able to ask for “An opera of The Demolished Man as written by Thomas Pynchon” and get back a satisfactory result.

item.description: @EricJGreenberg1 Lured away by Broadway. Who can blame him? (You did see they’re working on a musical based on A Contract with God, didn’t you?)
item.source:markdown: @EricJGreenberg1 Lured away by Broadway. Who can blame him? (You did see they’re working on a musical based on A Contract with God, didn’t you?)

item.description: @datadivajf Odd that we’ll find out by SNW Season 3?
item.source:markdown: @datadivajf Odd that we’ll find out by SNW Season 3?

item.description: As Yeshiva University looks to Republican lawyers and judges to keep it free of the gay and the gay-supportive, a Republican candidate for governor goes after the Jewish day school where his opponent’s kids are enrolled. https://t.co/kPvPDZi5bV

item.description: Certainly milder than the Satmar criticism of a Lubavitcher paper back in the day, which if I recall correctly was delivered in the form of Molotov cocktails. #ירידתהדורות https://t.co/D3HJ4gBxUm

item.description: @deonteleologist Related: Is there a defense-of-CRT book (or anti-anti-CRT book) you might recommend as a gift to my Beloved Conservative Relative, who gets mailings from Judicial Watch warning on their envelopes of CRT at West Point!!!!
item.source:markdown: @deonteleologist Related: Is there a defense-of-CRT book (or anti-anti-CRT book) you might recommend as a gift to my Beloved Conservative Relative, who gets mailings from Judicial Watch warning on their envelopes of CRT at West Point!!!!

item.description:
@pesachology This is also why the struggle is so important: The Beckett Fund will litigate Satmar’s case against NYS to the Supreme Court, because the religious authoritarians who are the core of the Republican Party want all schools to be run by unaccountable clergy and funded with tax $.

@pesachology If SCOTUS is not right sized, Satmar style education, albeit in English, will be the model for most American kids twenty years from now.
item.source:markdown:
@pesachology This is also why the struggle is so important: The Beckett Fund will litigate Satmar’s case against NYS to the Supreme Court, because the religious authoritarians who are the core of the Republican Party want all schools to be run by unaccountable clergy and funded with tax $.
@pesachology If SCOTUS is not right sized, Satmar style education, albeit in English, will be the model for most American kids twenty years from now.

item.description: @JamesFallows Biden’s team has rightfully decided that taking their subtle wins to the media just opens them up to being both sided into a net Republican victory. They’re really trying to mostly stay out of the cable news cycle.
item.source:markdown: @JamesFallows Biden’s team has rightfully decided that taking their subtle wins to the media just opens them up to being both sided into a net Republican victory. They’re really trying to mostly stay out of the cable news cycle.
